CustomField.description: BU - NPLMA; used to display address in SFS mobile app and Youreka. ADO 19238, 45294
CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Street)),Street & ", " & City &", " & State & ", " & PostalCode,
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Lat_Long_Name__c)), Lat_Long_Name__c&" ("&TEXT(Latitude)&","&TEXT(Longitude)&")",
IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Latitude))), TEXT(Latitude)&","&TEXT(Longitude),"Missing Address")))
CustomField.label: Formatted Address
